SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.color

Class MyShelfieAnsi

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.color.MyShelfieAnsi
public class MyShelfieAnsi extends Object
Provides a fluent API to generate ANSI escape sequences by specifying MyShelfieAttributes of your format.

    Shorthand for the Ansi code that resets to the terminal's default format.

    Two options must be separated by this SEPARATOR.
